title: Orcblood Legacy: Honor
description: ** Disclaimer: This book contains graphic content that may not be suitable for children. **  Fangdarr, the orc chieftain of the Zharnik clan, has returned from exile to lead his people to glory. As his conquest grows, so too does the insatiable hunger for more from the orcs of his clan. Desperate to avoid a war with the fortified dwarves and humans, Fangdarr seeks to buy time by culling a shadow dragon that has tormented the land for centuries. With the aid of his half-blooded brother, and other unlikely companions, Fangdarr embarks on a quest that will name him the greatest orc in history.
author: Bernard Bertram
